trans-unit.source: Represents an activity-based callback.
trans-unit.target: Representa uma chamada de retorno baseados em activity.

trans-unit.source: Activity delegates enable activity authors to expose callbacks with specific signatures that users of the activity can provide activity-based handlers for.
trans-unit.target: O delegado de atividade permitem autores de atividade para expor as chamadas de retorno com assinaturas específicas que os utilizadores da atividade podem fornecer processadores baseados em activity.

trans-unit.source: There are two types of activity delegates: <xref:System.Activities.ActivityAction%601> is used for invoking activities that do not have a return value, and <xref:System.Activities.ActivityFunc%601> is used for invoking activities that do have a return value.
trans-unit.target: Existem dois tipos de delegado de atividade: <xref:System.Activities.ActivityAction%601>é utilizado para invocar atividades que não tenham um valor de retorno e <xref:System.Activities.ActivityFunc%601>é utilizado para invocar atividades que tenham um valor de retorno.</xref:System.Activities.ActivityFunc%601> </xref:System.Activities.ActivityAction%601>

trans-unit.source: Activity delegates are useful in scenarios where a child activity must be constrained to having a certain signature.
trans-unit.target: O delegado de atividade é úteis em cenários onde uma atividade subordinada tem de ser restrita para ter uma assinatura de determinadas.

trans-unit.source: Called by derived class constructors to initialize the object.
trans-unit.target: Chamado pelo construtores de classes derivadas para inicializar o objeto.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets an optional friendly name that is used for debugging, validation, exception handling, and tracking.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um nome amigável opcional que é utilizado para depuração, validação, processamento de exceções e controlo.

trans-unit.source: This property is read-only at runtime.
trans-unit.target: Esta propriedade é só de leitura no tempo de execução.

trans-unit.source: If the value is set at runtime, an <xref:System.InvalidOperationException> is thrown.
trans-unit.target: Se o valor é definido no tempo de execução, um <xref:System.InvalidOperationException>é emitida.</xref:System.InvalidOperationException>

trans-unit.source: A friendly name that is used for debugging, validation, exception handling, and tracking.
trans-unit.target: Um nome amigável que é utilizado para depuração, validação, processamento de exceções e controlo.

trans-unit.source: When implemented in a derived class, returns the <xref href="System.Activities.DelegateOutArgument"></xref> of the <xref href="System.Activities.ActivityDelegate"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Quando implementada numa classe derivada, devolve a <xref href="System.Activities.DelegateOutArgument"> </xref> do <xref href="System.Activities.ActivityDelegate"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: An out argument for the <xref href="System.Activities.ActivityDelegate"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Um argumento de saída para o <xref href="System.Activities.ActivityDelegate"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the activity that is represented by this <xref href="System.Activities.ActivityDelegate"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a atividade que é representada por este <xref href="System.Activities.ActivityDelegate"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This property is read-only at runtime.
trans-unit.target: Esta propriedade é só de leitura no tempo de execução.

trans-unit.source: If the value is set at runtime, an <xref:System.InvalidOperationException> is thrown.
trans-unit.target: Se o valor é definido no tempo de execução, um <xref:System.InvalidOperationException>é emitida.</xref:System.InvalidOperationException>

trans-unit.source: The activity that is represented by this <xref href="System.Activities.ActivityDelegate"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A atividade que é representada por este <xref href="System.Activities.ActivityDelegate"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Supplies a list of runtime arguments for the <xref href="System.Activities.ActivityDelegate"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Fornece uma lista de argumentos de runtime para o <xref href="System.Activities.ActivityDelegate"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, this method can be used to customize the arguments that are used by the <xref:System.Activities.ActivityDelegate>.
trans-unit.target: Quando substituí-lo de uma classe derivada, este método pode ser utilizado para personalizar os argumentos que são utilizados pelo <xref:System.Activities.ActivityDelegate>.</xref:System.Activities.ActivityDelegate>

trans-unit.source: The list to be populated with runtime arguments.
trans-unit.target: A lista de ser preenchidos com argumentos de runtime.

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether the <xref:System.Activities.ActivityDelegate.DisplayName*> property value should be serialized to XAML.
trans-unit.target: Indica se o <xref:System.Activities.ActivityDelegate.DisplayName*>valor da propriedade deve ser serializado em XAML.</xref:System.Activities.ActivityDelegate.DisplayName*>

trans-unit.source: ShouldSerializeDisplayName returns `true` if the <xref:System.Activities.ActivityDelegate.DisplayName%2A> was explicitly set on the <xref:System.Activities.ActivityDelegate>.
trans-unit.target: Devolve ShouldSerializeDisplayName `true` se <xref:System.Activities.ActivityDelegate.DisplayName%2A>foi explicitamente definido em <xref:System.Activities.ActivityDelegate>.</xref:System.Activities.ActivityDelegate> </xref:System.Activities.ActivityDelegate.DisplayName%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>, if the <xref:System.Activities.ActivityDelegate.DisplayName*> property value should be serialized; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>, se o <xref:System.Activities.ActivityDelegate.DisplayName*>valor da propriedade deve ser serializada; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Activities.ActivityDelegate.DisplayName*>

trans-unit.source: Returns a <xref:System.String> representation of the <xref href="System.Activities.ActivityDelegate"></xref> that contains the <xref:System.Activities.ActivityDelegate.DisplayName*>.
trans-unit.target: Devolve um <xref:System.String>representação do <xref href="System.Activities.ActivityDelegate"> </xref> que contém o <xref:System.Activities.ActivityDelegate.DisplayName*>.</xref:System.Activities.ActivityDelegate.DisplayName*> </xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: A representation of the <xref href="System.Activities.ActivityDelegate"></xref> that contains the <xref:System.Activities.ActivityDelegate.DisplayName*>.
trans-unit.target: Uma representação do <xref href="System.Activities.ActivityDelegate"> </xref> que contém o <xref:System.Activities.ActivityDelegate.DisplayName*>.</xref:System.Activities.ActivityDelegate.DisplayName*>
